Beach Weddings & Events
Beach Weddings
Ballyhoo Room
Flag Room

Sunset Deck
Gallery
Beach Weddings
Beach Weddings
For those guests that are planning a Beach Wedding we offer our beachfront as an option for your ceremony.
Ballyhoo Room
Ballyhoo Room
Seated Maximum 120 persons
Cocktail style (standing) Maximum of 200 persons
When combined with the Flag Room
:
Seated  Maximum 220 persons
Seating either bar or dining height as well as outside are available, weather permitting. The Ballyhoo has a private bar and a stage area as well as audiovisual capabilities if needed. A standing cocktail party can accommodate up to 200. This area is open air in season and has the option of air conditioning or heating if needed.
Audio & Video
Drop down screen with projector
Cafe ambient string lights on dimmers
Stage
Cordless Microphone
Podium
* for large groups the Flag Room and Ballyhoo Room can be combined to form one large space.
Flag Room
Flag Room
Seated Maximum of 65 persons
Cocktail style (standing) Maximum of 80 persons
When combined with the Ballyhoo Room
:
Minimum 80 persons – Maximum 235 persons
Available for plated or buffet style dining, as well as hors d’oeuvres served passed or at stations.
Access to small balcony from Flag Room.
* for large groups the Flag Room and Ballyhoo Room can be combined to form one large space.
Captain’s Table
Captain’s Table
Maximum of 24 persons.
Two long rectangular community style tables with both banquette and chair seating. Regular Menu offered.
Sunset Deck
Sunset Deck
Maximum of 27 persons.
The Sunset Deck features a sunken patio step down style from the main area. It is semi private with 6 high top tables and easy access to the bar. The space has electronic roll down flaps for weather, but bad storms and wind can affect availability. Main restaurant menu or custom private menu options available.
Gallery
Past Weddings and Events

Fill out the form below and our Events Planner will be in touch with you ASAP.
